C

clearScreen() - Static method in class game.Game
When ran on unix systems, will clear the console for improved output and management of the text version of the game

E

enableAI() - Static method in class game.Game
A toggle that will set the flag which enables the AI

G

game - package game
 
Game - Class in game
Game implements the main controller that will call for the initialization of all our starting variables and contains the main logic for the game loop
Game() - Constructor for class game.Game
default constructor to create a game object default to player vs player mode if called
Game(boolean) - Constructor for class game.Game
The main constructor that will initialize the game.
getAIStatus() - Static method in class game.Game
A getter that returns the AI flag's status
getHitSuccess() - Static method in class game.Game
Returns a true or false based on whether the attack was successful or not

M

mapFromFiles(String, Board) - Static method in class game.Game
Reads from a given file and creates the current board and ship placements based on line-by-line fed information

S

setHitSuccess(boolean) - Static method in class game.Game
setter for hitSuccess
setupBoard(Board, Player, Board, Player) - Static method in class game.Game
Will setup the board when Player wishes to manually setup the boards.
setupInput(Board, Player, int, int) - Static method in class game.Game
Receives human and text file input, and creates boards based on the given information.
sleepThread(int) - Static method in class game.Game
When ran, will sleep the current thread for the milliseconds, effectively giving a transition frame
start() - Method in class game.Game
Default board difficulties Use the AI thingy to setup random board placement Implement Ship class features - ship sunk Fix board size constants Starting method that will instantiate all of our variables and begin the game loop
startCheck() - Method in class game.Game
 

U

userPlaceShip(Board, Player) - Static method in class game.Game
the main function used for the players to setup their ship placements

W

winCondition(Board) - Static method in class game.Game
A check that will be ran after every turn.
